tasks.label: ps
tasks.detail: View a list of all running containers for this project.

tasks.label: logs
tasks.detail: View logs for all services.

tasks.label: exec
tasks.detail: Open an interactive shell in the specified container.

tasks.label: test
tasks.detail: Run all tests with Robot Framework.

tasks.label: build
tasks.detail: Build and tag a new Docker image from the Dockerfile.

tasks.label: push
tasks.detail: Push the newly-built Docker image to a registry.

tasks.label: pull
tasks.detail: Pull the latest Docker images for this project.

tasks.label: up
tasks.detail: Start the services in a development environment.
tasks.command: FOCUS=${input:env} docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.gpu.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up

windows.command: $env:FOCUS = '${input:env}'; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.gpu.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up

tasks.label: context
tasks.detail: Change Docker context.

tasks.label: remote
tasks.detail: Test the local stack against a remote Docker daemon via SSH.
tasks.command: eval "$(ssh-agent -s)" && ssh-add one.key && docker context use one && ARCH='ARM' FOCUS=${input:env} docker compose up

tasks.label: upload
tasks.detail: Upload adapters to a remote server via SSH.
tasks.command: eval "$(ssh-agent -s)" && ssh-add one.key && scp -i one.key -r data/adapters opc@129.159.66.224:/home/opc/vtx/data

tasks.label: config
tasks.detail: Deploy a config to the remote Docker container.
tasks.command: docker context use one && ARCH='ARM' docker compose cp src/config.yml lab:/src/config.yml && docker context use default

tasks.label: train
tasks.detail: Train a model.
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up -d tbd && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.train.yml run -e FOCUS=${input:env} lab python3 harness.py

windows.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up -d tbd; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.train.yml run -e FOCUS=${input:env} lab python3 harness.py

tasks.label: deploy
tasks.detail: Deploy your book to CloudFlare.
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec lab python3 /src/scripts/cloudflare.py

tasks.label: prepare
tasks.detail: Prepare a dataset.
tasks.command: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run lab python3 /lab/${input:dir}/prepare.py

tasks.label: fetch
tasks.detail: Download a dataset.
tasks.command: docker compose  -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run lab python3 /lab/${input:dir}/fetch.py

tasks.label: auto
tasks.detail: Turn on autopilot.
tasks.command: FOCUS=${input:env} docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.gpu.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up -d

windows.command: $env:FOCUS = '${input:env}'; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.gpu.yml -f docker-compose.services.yml up -d

tasks.label: prune
tasks.detail: Prune all unused images, networks, and volumes.
tasks.command: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f

tasks.label: key
tasks.detail: Fetch your Urbit access key.

tasks.label: down
tasks.detail: Stop the service in Docker.

tasks.label: stats
tasks.detail: View live Docker stats.
